greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum {n>=0} 1/7^(2^n).
link: Aubrey J. Kempner, On Transcendental Numbers, Transactions of the American Mathematical Society, volume 17, number 4, October 1916, pages 476-482.
formula: Equals -Sum_{k>=1} mu(2*k)/(7^k - 1), where mu is the Möbius function (A008683). - _Amiram Eldar_, Jul 12 2020
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 11 2002
